title: Global leading countries in wine export 2018 , based on volume
summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in million hectoliters in each Country on the y axis.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is appeared to be the highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country New Zealand.
The difference of Export volume in million hectoliters between the highest and lowest Country is 18.4.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Export volume in million hectoliters for 11 number of Countrys.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is appeared to be the highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country New Zealand.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Export volume in million hectoliters for 11 number of Countrys.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country New Zealand.
The minimum Country New Zealand has got 8.08 times less Export volume in million hectoliters than the maximum Country Spain.
The Country Spain has the highest Export volume in million hectoliters, followed by , and France. Down to the Country New Zealand which is the lowest.
The Country Spain has 2.49 times more Export volume in million hectoliters than average.
The Export volume in million hectoliters is 92.6 if we add up values of all Countrys.
